These properties will help define the behavior and constraints related to each core value.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any communication CCC must be verifiable and transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any decision DDD must adhere to the ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"3. Develop Formal Rules and Inference Mechanisms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Create a set of formal rules and inference mechanisms that derive specific business practices from the core values. These rules will guide the implementation of core values in various aspects of the business.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If CCC is a communication, then CCC must be logged and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is a decision, then DDD must be justified with reference to EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"4. Use Formal Proof Systems\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Apply formal proof systems to verify that the derived business practices comply with the core values. This involves using logical frameworks and proof techniques to validate the consistency and correctness of the practices.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any communication CCC, prove that CCC is logged and accessible, thereby satisfying P1P1P1.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any decision DDD, prove that DDD adheres to ethical guidelines EEE, thereby satisfying P2P2P2.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"5. Implement Verification Tools\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Develop or use existing verification tools to automate the proof process. These tools can help ensure that the business practices consistently adhere to the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Automated Proof Checking\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Use tools like Coq or Lean to automatically verify proofs that business practices satisfy the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"6. Integrate with Business Processes\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Embed the formal proof systems and verification tools into the business processes. This ensures that all actions and decisions are continuously monitored and validated against the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Workflow Integration\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrate the verification tools into the business workflow management system to check for compliance in real-time.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Application: Integrity in Decision-Making\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Value (Axiom)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrity - All decisions must adhere to ethical guidelines and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Properties\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A decision DDD is ethical if it adheres to ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A decision DDD is transparent if the rationale RRR for DDD is documented and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is made, then DDD must be accompanied by RRR.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": RRR must reference EEE to prove ethical adherence.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proofs\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any decision DDD, show that RRR is documented (ensuring 2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any RRR, show that RRR references EEE (ensuring ethical adherence).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Verification Tool\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Coq/Lean Implementation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Use Coq or Lean to create a formal model of the decision-making process, where proofs of transparency and ethical adherence are automatically checked.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integration\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Workflow Whenever a decision is made, the system verifies that the decision is documented and adheres to ethical guidelines.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Constructing the Formal The role is evolving so please don‚Äôt let past concepts about sales color your perceptions going forward. Document: page_content='' metadata={'page_id': 19070977, 'page_title': 'Workflows', 'page_created': '2024-06-19 18:07:43.620000 UTC', 'page_content': '{"atlas_doc_format":{"value":"{\\"type\\":\\"doc\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Eraser: \\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"inlineCard\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"url\\":\\"https://app.eraser.io/workspace/3eO5WAO9DZPZILmscGzR?origin=share\\"}},{\\"text\\":\\"  \\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"This describes the main development workflow for new customers. We will be creating bespoke AI systems using custom models from HuggingFace that integrates with all their company data. The main system for our agency will have a development environment in Ubuntu 24.04 using VSCode and bash shell. The workflow will be:\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Create HEAD\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Generate a conceptual data model using GPT\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Generate documentation and C4 architecture diagrams automatically using GPT.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Create folder and file structure\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Create a project in Jira using the Jira API in our system.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Identify dependencies\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Complete first unblocked issue\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Re-generate documentation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Update HEAD\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Update C4 model view\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"HEAD will be managed with git and in addition to the usual contents, will contain:\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"All workspace information including terminal logs,\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"The current Jira issue,\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"The current code documentation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"The current C4 diagram\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"A pointer to HEAD in the diagram\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"A git diff\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"GPT will reference HEAD after each prompt.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\"}],\\"version\\":1}","representation":"atlas_doc_format"}}', 'page_details': '\\nPage ID : 19070977\\nCreated On : 2024-06-19 18:07:43.620000 UTC\\nTitle : Workflows\\n\\n{"atlas_doc_format":{"value":"{\\"type\\":\\"doc\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Eraser: \\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"inlineCard\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"url\\":\\"https://app.eraser.io/workspace/3eO5WAO9DZPZILmscGzR?origin=share\\"}},{\\"text\\":\\"  \\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"This describes the main development workflow for new customers. We will be creating bespoke AI systems using custom models from HuggingFace that integrates with all their company data. The main system for our agency will have a development environment in Ubuntu 24.04 using VSCode and bash shell. The workflow will be:\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Create HEAD\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Generate a conceptual data model using GPT\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Generate documentation and C4 architecture diagrams automatically using GPT.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Create folder and file structure\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Create a project in Jira using the Jira API in our system.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Identify dependencies\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Complete first unblocked issue\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Re-generate documentation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Update HEAD\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Update C4 model view\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"HEAD will be managed with git and in addition to the usual contents, will contain:\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"All workspace information including terminal logs,\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"The current Jira issue,\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"The current code documentation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"The current C4 diagram\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"A pointer to HEAD in the diagram\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"A git diff\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"GPT will reference HEAD after each prompt.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\"}],\\"version\\":1}","representation":"atlas_doc_format"}}\\n\\nnull'}

Document: page_content='' metadata={'page_id': 23560331, 'page_title': 'Large Language Models (LLMs)', 'page_created': '2024-06-23 18:57:19.952000 UTC', 'page_content': '{"atlas_doc_format":{"value":"{\\"type\\":\\"doc\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Introduction to LLMs\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Large Language Models (LLMs) are advanced artificial intelligence models designed to understand and generate human-like text. These models are trained on vast amounts of data and are capable of performing a variety of language-related tasks, from translation and summarization to question answering and content generation.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Why Learn About LLMs?\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\" Understanding LLMs is crucial for our sales representatives because we use them in our services. Having a solid grasp of this technology will enable our sales team to effectively explain its benefits and functionality to our customers. Being knowledgeable about LLMs allows us to demonstrate how our solutions are more accurate and context-aware, thereby building trust and credibility with our clients.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Key Concepts:\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"orderedList\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"order\\":1},\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"What are LLMs?\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"LLMs are neural network-based models that are trained to process and generate text. Examples include GPT-3, BERT, and T5.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Training Data:\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"LLMs are trained on diverse datasets that include books, articles, websites, and other textual data to develop a deep understanding of language.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Capabilities of prompts.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Language Translation:\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\" They can translate text between multiple languages with high accuracy.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Text summaries.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Question undergo a pre-training phase where they learn from a large corpus of text data. abilities.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Fine-tuning:\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"After This knowledge not only helps in building trust and credibility but also empowers our sales reps to address customer queries confidently and demonstrate the value of our advanced, context-aware solutions. Document: page_content='' metadata={'page_id': 23658502, 'page_title': 'Philosophy', 'page_created': '2024-06-22 19:33:56.154000 UTC', 'page_content': '{"atlas_doc_format":{"value":"{\\"type\\":\\"doc\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Diamond Jack is founded on the philosophical basis of using intuitions from formal language theory and the functional programming paradigm to inform the construction of a system for structuring the output of large language models. The idea is to combine the rigor and structure of a formal language with the intelligence and dynamism of an autonomous agent. This serves as a form of program correctness verification so that the intuition of side-effects is excluded from the model.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Components of the These properties will help define the behavior and constraints related to each core value.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any communication CCC must be verifiable and transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any decision DDD must adhere to the ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"3. Develop Formal Rules and Inference Mechanisms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Create a set of formal rules and inference mechanisms that derive specific business practices from the core values. These rules will guide the implementation of core values in various aspects of the business.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If CCC is a communication, then CCC must be logged and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is a decision, then DDD must be justified with reference to EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"4. Use Formal Proof Systems\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Apply formal proof systems to verify that the derived business practices comply with the core values. This involves using logical frameworks and proof techniques to validate the consistency and correctness of the practices.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any communication CCC, prove that CCC is logged and accessible, thereby satisfying P1P1P1.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any decision DDD, prove that DDD adheres to ethical guidelines EEE, thereby satisfying P2P2P2.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"5. Implement Verification Tools\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Develop or use existing verification tools to automate the proof process. These tools can help ensure that the business practices consistently adhere to the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Automated Proof Checking\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Use tools like Coq or Lean to automatically verify proofs that business practices satisfy the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"6. Integrate with Business Processes\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Embed the formal proof systems and verification tools into the business processes. This ensures that all actions and decisions are continuously monitored and validated against the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Workflow Integration\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrate the verification tools into the business workflow management system to check for compliance in real-time.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Application: Integrity in Decision-Making\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Value (Axiom)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrity - All decisions must adhere to ethical guidelines and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Properties\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A decision DDD is ethical if it adheres to ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A decision DDD is transparent if the rationale RRR for DDD is documented and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is made, then DDD must be accompanied by RRR.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": RRR must reference EEE to prove ethical adherence.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proofs\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any decision DDD, show that RRR is documented (ensuring transparency).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any RRR, show that RRR references EEE (ensuring ethical adherence).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Verification Tool\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Coq/Lean Implementation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Use Coq or Lean to create a formal model of the decision-making process, where proofs of transparency and ethical adherence are automatically checked.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integration\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Workflow System\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrate the formal verification system with the company\'s decision-making workflow. Whenever a decision is made, the system verifies that the decision is documented and adheres to ethical guidelines.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formalizing the Concept of Witnesses in Core Value Systems\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"1. Core Values as Axioms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Define each core value as an axiom in a formal system.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Core Value (Axiom)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integrity\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": All actions and communications within the business must adhere to the highest ethical standards and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"2. Formal Properties and Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Translate the core values into formal properties and rules that describe how actions and practices should behave.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Properties\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any communication CCC must be verifiable and transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any decision DDD must adhere to the ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If CCC is a communication, then CCC must be logged and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is a decision, then DDD must be justified with reference to EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"3. Practices and Actions as Witnesses\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"A practice or action is a witness if it satisfies the formal properties and rules derived from the core values. In other words, the practice or action demonstrates that the core value is being adhered to in the business context.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Practice (Witness)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Logging all communications in an accessible manner.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"This practice satisfies the property P1P1P1 and rule R1R1R1, serving as a witness to the core value of Integrity.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Action (Witness)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Justifying all decisions with reference to ethical guidelines and documenting the rationale.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"This action satisfies the property P2P2P2 and rule R2R2R2, serving as a witness to the core value of Integrity.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Constructing the Formal System\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Step 1: Define Core Values (Axioms)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"orderedList\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"order\\":1},\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integrity\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": All actions and communications must adhere to ethical standards and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Innovation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Continuous improvement and creativity in products, services, and processes.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Customer Focus\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Prioritizing customer needs and satisfaction.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Step 2: Establish Properties and Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integrity\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any communication CCC must be verifiable and transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any decision DDD must adhere to ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Innovation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P3\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any process PPP should incorporate mechanisms for continuous improvement.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P4\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any product RRR should include creative design elements.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Customer Focus\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P5\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any service SSS should prioritize customer needs and feedback.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P6\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any marketing MMM should be tailored to customer segments.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1 (Integrity)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If CCC is a communication, then CCC must be logged and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2 (Integrity)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is a decision, then DDD must be justified with reference to EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R3 (Innovation)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If PPP is a process, then PPP must include feedback loops for continuous improvement.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R4 (Innovation)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If RRR is a product, then RRR must include creative elements.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R5 (Customer Focus)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If SSS is a service, then SSS must include mechanisms for collecting and acting on customer feedback.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R6 (Customer Focus)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If MMM is marketing, then MMM must be customized for different customer segments.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Step 3: Prove Properties and Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Using a formal proof system, prove that the properties and rules are satisfied by specific practices or actions. These proofs serve as the verification that the core values are being upheld.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Proof\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof for Integrity\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"For any communication CCC, show that CCC is logged and accessible (verifying P1P1P1 and satisfying R1R1R1).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"For any decision DDD, show that DDD references ethical guidelines EEE and is documented (verifying P2P2P2 and satisfying R2R2R2).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof for Innovation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"For any process PPP, show that PPP includes feedback loops (verifying P3P3P3 and satisfying R3R3R3).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"For any product RRR, show that RRR includes creative design elements (verifying P4P4P4 and satisfying R4R4R4).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof for Customer Focus\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"For any service SSS, show that SSS includes mechanisms for collecting and acting on customer feedback (verifying P5P5P5 and satisfying R5R5R5).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"For any marketing MMM, show that MMM is customized for 'page_details': '\\nPage ID : 23658502\\nCreated On : 2024-06-22 19:33:56.154000 UTC\\nTitle : Philosophy\\n\\n{"atlas_doc_format":{"value":"{\\"type\\":\\"doc\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Diamond Jack is founded on the philosophical basis of using intuitions from formal language theory and the functional programming paradigm to inform the construction of a system for structuring the output of large language models. The idea is to combine the rigor and structure of a formal language with the intelligence and dynamism of an autonomous agent. This serves as a form of program correctness verification so that the intuition of side-effects is excluded from the model.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Reference thread: \\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"inlineCard\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"url\\":\\"https://chatgpt.com/c/12b3a1e7-8b94-40ea-87bc-d63af052cbdf\\"}},{\\"text\\":\\" \\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Components of the Idea\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"orderedList\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"order\\":1},\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Philosophical Basis\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Language Theory\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": The study of syntactic and semantic properties of formal languages.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Functional Programming Paradigm\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A programming paradigm that treats computation as the evaluation of mathematical functions and avoids changing-state and mutable data.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"System Construction\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Rigorous Structure\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Ensuring that the system\'s architecture and outputs are formally defined and verifiable.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Autonomous Agent\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": An AI system that can operate independently to perform tasks.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Program Correctness reviews\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R21\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Accountability ‚Üí Be open about actions and decisions\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Transparency\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R22\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Transparency ‚Üí Make information Transparency ‚Üí Ensure honest marketing\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Respect\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R25\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Respect ‚Üí Support employee well-being\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":2},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proofs and Program Correctness Verification\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"underline\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"1. Define Core Values as Axioms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Start by clearly defining each core value as an axiom. These axioms will serve as the foundational truths upon which the entire system is built.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integrity\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": All actions and communications within the business must adhere to the highest ethical standards and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"2. Establish Formal Properties\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Translate the core values into formal properties that can be used in logical statements. These properties will help define the behavior and constraints related to each core value.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any communication CCC must be verifiable and transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any decision DDD must adhere to the ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"3. Develop Formal Rules and Inference Mechanisms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Create a set of formal rules and inference mechanisms that derive specific business practices from the core values. These rules will guide the implementation of core values in various aspects of the business.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If CCC is a communication, then CCC must be logged and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is a decision, then DDD must be justified with reference to EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"4. Use Formal Proof Systems\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Apply formal proof systems to verify that the derived business practices comply with the core values. This involves using logical frameworks and proof techniques to validate the consistency and correctness of the practices.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any communication CCC, prove that CCC is logged and accessible, thereby satisfying P1P1P1.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any decision DDD, prove that DDD adheres to ethical guidelines EEE, thereby satisfying P2P2P2.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"5. Implement Verification Tools\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Develop or use existing verification tools to automate the proof process. These tools can help ensure that the business practices consistently adhere to the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Automated Proof Checking\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Use tools like Coq or Lean to automatically verify proofs that business practices satisfy the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"6. Integrate with Business Processes\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Embed the formal proof systems and verification tools into the business processes. This ensures that all actions and decisions are continuously monitored and validated against the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Workflow Integration\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrate the verification tools into the business workflow management system to check for compliance in real-time.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Application: Integrity in Decision-Making\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Value (Axiom)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrity - All decisions must adhere to ethical guidelines and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal A decision DDD is ethical if it adheres to ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A decision DDD is transparent if the rationale RRR for DDD is documented and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is made, then DDD must be accompanied by RRR.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": RRR must reference EEE to prove ethical adherence.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proofs\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any decision DDD, show that RRR is documented (ensuring 2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any RRR, show that RRR references EEE (ensuring ethical and ethical adherence are automatically checked.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integration\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Workflow Practices and Actions as Witnesses\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"A practice or action is a witness if it satisfies the formal properties and rules derived from the core values. In other words, the practice or action demonstrates that the core value is being adhered to in the business context.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Practice manner.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"This practice satisfies the property P1P1P1 and rule R1R1R1, serving as a witness to the core value of Any marketing MMM should be tailored to customer segments.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1 (Integrity)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If CCC is a communication, then CCC must be logged and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2 (Integrity)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is a decision, then DDD must be justified with reference to EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R3 (Innovation)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If PPP is a process, then PPP must include feedback loops for continuous improvement.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R4 (Innovation)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If RRR is a product, then RRR must include creative elements.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R5 (Customer Focus)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If SSS is a service, then SSS must include mechanisms for collecting and acting on customer feedback.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R6 (Customer Focus)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If MMM is marketing, then MMM must be customized for different customer segments.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Step 3: Prove Properties and Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Using a formal proof system, prove that the properties and rules are satisfied by specific practices or actions. These proofs serve as the verification that the core values are being upheld.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Proof\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof for Integrity\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"For any communication CCC, show that CCC is logged and accessible (verifying P1P1P1 and satisfying R1R1R1).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"For any decision DDD, show that DDD references ethical guidelines EEE and is documented (verifying P2P2P2 and satisfying R2R2R2).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof for Innovation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"For R3R3R3).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"For any product RRR, show that RRR includes creative design (Witness)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Logging R1R1R1, thus serving as a witness to the core value of Integrity.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Action Integrity.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example: Step-by-Step Approach to Ensuring Comprehensive Transparency\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"1. Comprehensive Definition of Core Values\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Value (Axiom)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Transparency\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": All actions and communications within the business must be open, accessible, and verifiable, ensuring no information is hidden and all stakeholders are informed.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"2. rationale.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P3\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": adheres to the core value of transparency.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Overall Proof\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"orderedList\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"order\\":1},\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Sequence transparency.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Comprehensive Transparency\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Prove that the entire process, as a sequence of steps, maintains comprehensive transparency.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Summary\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"To ensure that a process or practice is truly in the language of the system and adheres to core values like transparency, we need to:\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"orderedList\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"order\\":1},\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Define Document: page_content='' metadata={'page_id': 23658502, 'page_title': 'Philosophy', 'page_created': '2024-06-22 19:33:56.154000 UTC', 'page_content': '{"atlas_doc_format":{"value":"{\\"type\\":\\"doc\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Diamond Jack is founded on the philosophical basis of using intuitions from formal language theory and the functional programming paradigm to inform the construction of a system for structuring the output of large language models. The idea is to combine the rigor and structure of a formal language with the intelligence and dynamism of an autonomous agent. This serves as a form of program correctness verification so that the intuition of side-effects is excluded from the model.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Components of the Idea\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"orderedList\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"order\\":1},\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Philosophical Basis\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Language Theory\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": The study of syntactic and semantic properties of formal languages.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Functional Programming Paradigm\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A programming paradigm that treats computation as the evaluation of mathematical functions and avoids changing-state and mutable data.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"System Construction\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Rigorous Structure\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Ensuring that the system\'s architecture and outputs are formally defined and verifiable.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Autonomous Agent\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": An AI system that can operate independently to perform tasks.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Program Correctness Side-Effects\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Ensuring that functions and processes do not produce unintended changes in state, thus maintaining purity in computation.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Canonical Map for Each provides the syntactic and semantic foundation, while the functional programming paradigm ensures computational purity and correctness. The autonomous agent should operate within this framework, utilizing the defined grammar and rules to perform tasks without side-effects, ensuring reliability and predictability.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Canonical
