Respect ‚Üí Support employee well-being\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":2},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proofs and Program Correctness Verification\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"underline\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"1. Define Core Values as Axioms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Start by clearly defining each core value as an axiom. These axioms will serve as the foundational truths upon which the entire system is built.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integrity\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": All actions and communications within the business must adhere to the highest ethical standards and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"2. Establish Formal Properties\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Translate the core values into formal properties that can be used in logical statements. These properties will help define the behavior and constraints related to each core value.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any communication CCC must be verifiable and transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any decision DDD must adhere to the ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"3. Develop Formal Rules and Inference Mechanisms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Create a set of formal rules and inference mechanisms that derive specific business practices from the core values. These rules will guide the implementation of core values in various aspects of the business.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If CCC is a communication, then CCC must be logged and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is a decision, then DDD must be justified with reference to EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"4. Use Formal Proof Systems\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Apply formal proof systems to verify that the derived business practices comply with the core values. This involves using logical frameworks and proof techniques to validate the consistency and correctness of the practices.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any communication CCC, prove that CCC is logged and accessible, thereby satisfying P1P1P1.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any decision DDD, prove that DDD adheres to ethical guidelines EEE, thereby satisfying P2P2P2.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"5. Implement Verification Tools\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Develop or use existing verification tools to automate the proof process. These tools can help ensure that the business practices consistently adhere to the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Automated Proof Checking\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Use tools like Coq or Lean to automatically verify proofs that business practices satisfy the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"6. Integrate with Business Processes\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Embed the formal proof systems and verification tools into the business processes. This ensures that all actions and decisions are continuously monitored and validated against the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Workflow Integration\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrate the verification tools into the business workflow management system to check for compliance in real-time.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Application: Integrity in Decision-Making\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Value (Axiom)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrity - All decisions must adhere to ethical guidelines and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Properties\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A decision DDD is ethical if it adheres to ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A decision DDD is transparent if the rationale RRR for DDD is documented and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is made, then DDD must be accompanied by RRR.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": RRR must reference EEE to prove ethical adherence.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proofs\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any decision DDD, show that RRR is documented (ensuring transparency).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any RRR, show that RRR references EEE (ensuring ethical adherence).\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Verification Tool\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Coq/Lean Implementation\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Use Coq or Lean to create a formal model of the decision-making process, where proofs of transparency and ethical adherence are automatically checked.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integration\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Workflow System\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrate the formal verification system with the company\'s decision-making workflow. Whenever a decision is made, the system verifies that the decision is documented and adheres to ethical guidelines.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"},{\\"type\\":\\"hardBreak\\"}]}],\\"version\\":1}","representation":"atlas_doc_format"}}', 'page_details': '\\nPage ID : 23658502\\nCreated On : 2024-06-22 19:33:56.154000 UTC\\nTitle : Philosophy\\n\\n{"atlas_doc_format":{"value":"{\\"type\\":\\"doc\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Diamond Jack is founded on the philosophical basis of using intuitions from formal language theory and the functional programming paradigm to inform the construction of a system for structuring the output of large language models. The idea is to combine the rigor and structure of a formal language with the intelligence and dynamism of an autonomous agent. This serves as a form of program correctness verification so that the intuition of side-effects is excluded from the model.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Components of the Idea\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"orderedList\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"order\\":1},\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Philosophical Basis\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Language Theory\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": The study of syntactic and semantic properties of formal languages.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Functional Programming Paradigm\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A programming paradigm that treats computation as the evaluation of mathematical functions and avoids changing-state and mutable data.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"System Construction\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Rigorous Structure\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Ensuring that the system\'s architecture and outputs are formally defined and verifiable.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Autonomous Agent\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": An AI system that can operate independently to perform tasks.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Program Correctness Verification\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Excluding Side-Effects\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Ensuring that functions and processes do not produce unintended changes in state, thus maintaining purity in computation.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Canonical Map for Each Component\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"1. Formal Language Theory\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Alphabet (Œ£)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"The set of all possible symbols that can be used in the language.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Canonical Map\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Define a comprehensive set of symbols representing all potential inputs, commands, and outputs.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"*\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Strings marketing\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Respect\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R25\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Respect ‚Üí Promote diversity and inclusion\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R26\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Respect ‚Üí Handle conflicts fairly\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R27\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Respect ‚Üí Support employee well-being\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":2},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proofs and Program Correctness Verification\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"underline\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"1. Define Core Values as Axioms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Start by clearly defining each core value as an axiom. These axioms will serve as the foundational truths upon which the entire system is built.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integrity\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": All actions and communications within the business must adhere to the highest ethical standards and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"2. Establish Formal Properties\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Translate the core values into formal properties that can be used in logical statements. These properties will help define the behavior and constraints related to each core value.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any communication CCC must be verifiable and transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any decision DDD must adhere to the ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"3. Develop Formal Rules and Inference Mechanisms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Create a set of formal rules and inference mechanisms that derive specific business practices from the core values. These rules will guide the implementation of core values in various aspects of the business.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If CCC is a communication, then CCC must be logged and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is a decision, then DDD must be justified with reference to EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"4. Use Formal Proof Systems\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Apply formal proof systems to verify that the derived business practices comply with the core values. This involves using logical frameworks and proof techniques to validate the consistency and correctness of the practices.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any communication CCC, prove that CCC is logged and accessible, thereby satisfying P1P1P1.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any decision DDD, prove that DDD adheres to ethical guidelines EEE, thereby satisfying P2P2P2.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"5. Implement Verification Tools\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Develop or use existing verification tools to automate the proof process. These tools can help ensure that the business practices consistently adhere to the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Automated Proof Checking\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Use tools like Coq or Lean to automatically verify proofs that business practices satisfy the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"6. Integrate with Business Processes\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Embed the formal proof systems and verification tools into the business processes. This ensures that all actions and decisions are continuously monitored and validated against the core values.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Workflow Integration\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrate the verification tools into the business workflow management system to check for compliance in real-time.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Application: Integrity in Decision-Making\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Value (Axiom)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Integrity - All decisions must adhere to ethical guidelines and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Properties\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A decision DDD is ethical if it adheres to ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A decision DDD is transparent if the rationale RRR for DDD is documented and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Rules\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is made, then DDD must be accompanied by RRR.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": RRR must reference EEE to prove ethical adherence.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proofs\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof Document: page_content='' metadata={'page_id': 23658502, 'page_title': 'Philosophy', 'page_created': '2024-06-22 19:33:56.154000 UTC', 'page_content': '{"atlas_doc_format":{"value":"{\\"type\\":\\"doc\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Diamond Jack is founded on the philosophical basis of using intuitions from formal language theory and the functional programming paradigm to inform the construction of a system for structuring the output of large language models. The idea is to combine the rigor and structure of a formal language with the intelligence and dynamism of an autonomous agent. This serves as a form of program correctness verification so that the intuition of side-effects is excluded from the model.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"When applied to business systems, axioms can be thought of as \\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Components of the Idea\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"orderedList\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"order\\":1},\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Philosophical Basis\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Language Theory\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": The study of syntactic and semantic properties of formal languages.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Functional Programming Paradigm\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A programming paradigm that treats computation as the evaluation of mathematical functions and avoids changing-state and mutable data.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"System Construction\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Rigorous Structure\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Ensuring that the system\'s architecture and outputs are formally defined and verifiable.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Autonomous Agent\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": An AI system that can operate independently to perform tasks.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Program Correctness Verification\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Excluding Side-Effects\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Ensuring that functions and processes do not produce unintended changes in state, thus maintaining purity in computation.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Canonical Map for Each Component\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"1. Formal Language Theory\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Alphabet (Œ£)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"The set of all possible symbols that can be used in the Map\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Define a comprehensive set of symbols representing all potential inputs, commands, and outputs.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"*\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"Strings structure.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Semantics (M)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"The Map\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Develop a mapping of syntactic structures to their meanings, ensuring consistent interpretation.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"2. Functional Programming Paradigm\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Pure Functions\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Functions that return the same output for the same input and have no side-effects.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Canonical Map\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Define pure functions for all operations, ensuring predictable and reproducible outcomes.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Immutability\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Data cannot be modified once created.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Canonical Map\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Design data structures that are immutable, ensuring data integrity.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"First-Class Functions\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Functions achieveTarget = (current, target) => current >= target ? \\\\\\"Target Achieved\\\\\\" : achieveTarget(current + increment, target)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"code\\"}]}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":4},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Values as \\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"{Innovation, Excellence, Sustainability, Responsibility, Data Privacy, Transparency, Continuous 'page_details': '\\nPage ID : 23658502\\nCreated On : 2024-06-22 19:33:56.154000 UTC\\nTitle : Philosophy\\n\\n{"atlas_doc_format":{"value":"{\\"type\\":\\"doc\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Diamond Jack is founded on the philosophical basis of using intuitions from formal language theory and the functional programming paradigm to inform the construction of a system for structuring the output of large language models. The idea is to combine the rigor and structure of a formal language with the intelligence and dynamism of an autonomous agent. This serves as a form of program correctness verification so that the intuition of side-effects is excluded from the model.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"When applied to business systems, axioms can be thought of as \\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Core Components of the Idea\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"orderedList\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"order\\":1},\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Philosophical Basis\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Formal Language Theory\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": The study of syntactic and semantic properties of formal languages.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Functional Programming Paradigm\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": A programming paradigm that treats computation as the evaluation of mathematical functions and avoids changing-state and mutable data.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"System verifiable.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Autonomous Agent\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": An AI system that can operate independently to perform tasks.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Program Correctness Side-Effects\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Ensuring that functions and processes do not produce unintended changes in state, thus maintaining purity in computation.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Canonical Map for Each provides the syntactic and semantic foundation, while the functional programming paradigm ensures computational purity and correctness. The autonomous agent should operate within this framework, utilizing the defined grammar and rules to perform tasks without side-effects, ensuring reliability and predictability.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example Canonical \\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"},{\\"text\\":\\"function sum(a, b) { return a + b; }\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"code\\"}]}]}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Semantics (M)\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Mapping: Define Core Values as Axioms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Start by clearly defining each core value as an axiom. These axioms will serve as the foundational truths upon which the entire system is built.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Integrity\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": All actions and communications within the business must adhere to the highest ethical standards and be transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"2. Establish Formal Properties\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Translate the core values into formal properties that can be used in logical statements. These properties will help define the behavior and constraints related to each core value.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any communication CCC must be verifiable and transparent.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"P2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": Any decision DDD must adhere to the ethical guidelines EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"3. Develop Formal Rules and Inference Mechanisms\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Create a set of formal rules and inference mechanisms that derive specific business practices from the core values. These rules will guide the implementation of core values in various aspects of the business.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If CCC is a communication, then CCC must be logged and accessible.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"R2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": If DDD is a decision, then DDD must be justified with reference to EEE.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"4. Use Formal Proof Systems\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Apply formal proof systems to verify that the derived business practices comply with the core values. This involves using logical frameworks and proof techniques to validate the consistency and correctness of the practices.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Example\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\":\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"bulletList\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 1\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any communication CCC, prove that CCC is logged and accessible, thereby satisfying P1P1P1.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"listItem\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Proof 2\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\",\\"marks\\":[{\\"type\\":\\"strong\\"}]},{\\"text\\":\\": For any decision DDD, prove that DDD adheres to ethical guidelines EEE, thereby satisfying P2P2P2.\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]}]}]},{\\"type\\":\\"heading\\",\\"attrs\\":{\\"level\\":3},\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"5. Implement Verification Tools\\",\\"type\\":\\"text\\"}]},{\\"type\\":\\"paragraph\\",\\"content\\":[{\\"text\\":\\"Develop or use existing verification tools to automate the proof process.
